title: Sussur Sickle
content:
Sussur Sickle Rare 2~5 Damage 1d4 +1 SlashingSilences targets on hit. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The sheen of Sussur sap forged into this sickle glows blue when it cuts through arcane energy. Sickle Light 0.9 120

1d4 +1 SlashingSilences targets on hit.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The sheen of Sussur sap forged into this sickle glows blue when it cuts through arcane energy.
